summary: The `common` package imports the `ms` library but doesn't include its type definitions (@types/ms), causing type validation issues for Duration properties and breaking temporal usage when the package is used as a transitive dependency without explicit type assertions.
userImpact: Users experience type validation failures and broken Temporal usage when the common package is pulled in as a transitive dependency without explicit type assertions or const assertions.
rootCause: Missing @types/ms dependency in the common package despite importing the ms library at runtime.
workaround: Use `as const` or explicit type annotations on Duration props.
keyQuote: The `common` package imports `ms` but not its types. As such, there is no validation on e.g. `Duration` props.
